member.name: T:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRemoteService
member.summary: Remote service interface for Note API operations using JSONPlaceholder Note: JSONPlaceholder does not persist write changes; POST/PUT/DELETE return simulated success

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRemoteService.GetNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets all notes from remote API (maps to GET /posts)

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRemoteService.GetNoteAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a single note by ID from remote API (maps to GET /posts/{id})
member.param: The note identifier (maps to post ID)

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRemoteService.CreateNoteAsync(TP6.Models.Entity.Note,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new note on remote API (maps to POST /posts) Note: JSONPlaceholder simulates success but does not persist the data

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRemoteService.UpdateNoteAsync(TP6.Models.Entity.Note,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Updates an existing note on remote API (maps to PUT /posts/{id}) Note: JSONPlaceholder simulates success but does not persist changes

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRemoteService.DeleteNoteAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes a note from remote API (maps to DELETE /posts/{id}) Note: JSONPlaceholder simulates success but does not actually delete

member.name: T:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository
member.summary: Repository interface for local Note data access

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.GetAllAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets all notes from local storage, ordered by creation date descending

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.GetByIdAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a note by its unique identifier

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.GetPendingSyncAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets notes that are pending synchronization with remote service

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.UpsertAsync(TP6.Models.Entity.Note,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Inserts a new note or updates existing note (upsert operation)

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.InsertAsync(TP6.Models.Entity.Note,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Inserts a new note into local storage

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.UpdateAsync(TP6.Models.Entity.Note,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Updates an existing note in local storage

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.DeleteAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes a note by its identifier

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.INoteRepository.DeleteAllAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes all notes from local storage

member.name: T:TP6.Core.Interfaces.ISyncService
member.summary: Service interface for synchronizing notes between local storage and remote API

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.ISyncService.SyncNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Synchronizes notes between local and remote storage - Pull: Fetches all remote notes and upserts them into local storage - Push (optional): Uploads pending local notes to remote API and marks them as synced

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.ISyncService.PullNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Pulls all notes from remote API and stores them locally

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.ISyncService.PushNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Pushes pending local notes to remote API Note: JSONPlaceholder does not persist changes, so this simulates the push operation

member.name: T:TP6.Core.Interfaces.IUserProfileRemoteService
member.summary: Remote service interface for User Profile API operations using JSONPlaceholder

member.name: M:TP6.Core.Interfaces.IUserProfileRemoteService.GetUserAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets user profile data from remote API (maps to GET /users/{id})

member.name: T:TP6.Infrastructure.DependencyInjection
member.summary: Extension class for registering Infrastructure layer dependencies

member.name: M:TP6.Infrastructure.DependencyInjection.AddInfrastructure(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers all Infrastructure services including repositories, web services, and sync services
member.param: The service collection to add services to

member.name: T:TP6.Infrastructure.Repositories.NoteRepository
member.summary: Repository implementation for local Note data access using SQLite

member.name: T:TP6.Infrastructure.Sync.NotesSyncService
member.summary: Service for synchronizing notes between local storage and remote API Orchestrates pull (remote to local) and push (local to remote) operations

member.name: M:TP6.Infrastructure.Sync.NotesSyncService.SyncNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Synchronizes notes between local and remote storage - Pull: Fetches all remote notes and upserts them into local storage - Push: Uploads pending local notes to remote API and marks them as synced

member.name: M:TP6.Infrastructure.Sync.NotesSyncService.PullNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Pulls all notes from remote API and stores them locally Remote notes are marked as synced and not pending

member.name: M:TP6.Infrastructure.Sync.NotesSyncService.PushNotesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Pushes pending local notes to remote API Note: JSONPlaceholder does not persist changes, so this simulates the push operation After successful push (simulated), notes are marked as synced locally

member.summary: Deletes a note from remote API (maps to DELETE /posts/{id}) Note: JSONPlaceholder simulates success but does not actually delete
